patterns.pattern: ^(.+) halts gracefully to avoid collision with (\w+)
^The ship launches a probe towards the asteroid.
^The probe reports a source of (.*), good for (\d+) refined units of the material\.$

^The ship collects the surrounding (.*) into its scoops, bringing the collected total to (\d+)\.$
